name: Mp3 Quran Translations In 52 languages and 54 different reciters by TrueMuslims.Net
author: TrueMuslims.Net IT Support

sections.description:
• Quran Translations in 52 languages

sections.installation:
• Upload the Mp3 Quran Translations plugin to wordpress site or blog, Activate it.
  • Go to Mp3 Quran from menu.
  • Copy yellow code like this: [mp3Quran]*[/mp3Quran] and past code in your post or page.
  • Done!
